text: Nde Roman guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgiap, nden kamgim, nde anan gumgi gu mbigi kim, gu kha gava khergiap mba bunin za nde ndi mbai. Nzan Ndia Fhe Bakɨme gum nzan Bakɨme Zisas Krais, mani fhura nden korar muuŋv, nden ndavir muuŋgirim, nde ndavi mbɨrav kɨri.
